org.jruyi.io

Interface ISessionListener<I,O>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of incoming message
    O - type of outgoing message
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SessionListener

    public interface ISessionListener<I,O>
    This interface defines callback methods for being called on session events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beforeSendMessage(ISession session, O outMsg)
      Callback method right before sending message.
      void onMessageReceived(ISession session, I inMsg)
      Callback method on message received.
      void onMessageSent(ISession session, O outMsg)
      Callback method on message sent.
      void onSessionClosed(ISession session)
      Callback method on session closed.
      void onSessionConnectTimedOut(ISession session)
      Callback method on session connect timed out.
      void onSessionException(ISession session, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Callback method on session exception.
      void onSessionIdleTimedOut(ISession session)
      Callback method on session idle timed out.
      void onSessionOpened(ISession session)
      Callback method on session opened.
      void onSessionReadTimedOut(ISession session, O outMsg)
      Callback method on response timed out for the specified msg.

    • Method Detail

      • onSessionOpened

        void onSessionOpened(ISession session)
        Callback method on session opened.
        Parameters:
        session - the opened session

      • onSessionClosed

        void onSessionClosed(ISession session)
        Callback method on session closed.
        Parameters:
        session - the closed session

      • beforeSendMessage

        void beforeSendMessage(ISession session,
                       O outMsg)
        Callback method right before sending message.
        Parameters:
        session - the session to send the message
        outMsg - the message to be sent
        Since:
        2.1

      • onMessageSent

        void onMessageSent(ISession session,
                   O outMsg)
        Callback method on message sent.
        Parameters:
        session - the session sent the message
        outMsg - the message sent

      • onMessageReceived

        void onMessageReceived(ISession session,
                       I inMsg)
        Callback method on message received.
        Parameters:
        session - the session received the message
        inMsg - the message received

      • onSessionException

        void onSessionException(ISession session,
                        java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Callback method on session exception.
        Parameters:
        session - the session got exception
        cause - the exception

      • onSessionIdleTimedOut

        void onSessionIdleTimedOut(ISession session)
        Callback method on session idle timed out.
        Parameters:
        session - the idle timed out session

      • onSessionConnectTimedOut

        Callback method on session connect timed out.
        Parameters:
        session - the connect timed out session

      • onSessionReadTimedOut

        void onSessionReadTimedOut(ISession session,
                           O outMsg)
        Callback method on response timed out for the specified msg.
        Parameters:
        session - the session in which the response timed out
        outMsg - the request for which the response timed out
